definitions.body: coll. sprouting, growth, [[הָאֲדָמָה]] ´[[ח]] Ge 19:25 (J), [[הַשָּׂדֶה]] ´[[ח]] Ez Eze 16:7 (sim.), cf. Is 61:11, Ps 65:11; so [[יהוה]] ´[[ח]] Is 4:2, ´[[ח]] abs. Ho 8:7; growth (= foliage) of vine, ´[[טַרְפֵּי ח]] Ez Eze 17:9.
process of growth, of vine, [[עֲרֻגׁת חִמְתָהּ]] Ez Eze 17:10 = the beds where it grew.

future ruler, under fig. of sprout from Davidic tree (cf. Ps 132:17) [[וַהֲקִמׂתִי]] [[חַדִּיק]] Je 23:5 a righteous sprout, shoot, = [[חְדָקָה]] ´[[אַחְמִיחַ לְדָוִד ח]] Je 33:15; hence (as n.pr.) ´[[חַבְדִּי ח]] Ze Zec 3:8, of Zerub. [[שְׁמוֹ]] ´[[אִישׁ ח]] Zec 6:12.
